channel.title: Makefile in Netbeans
channel.description:
i created a file called:Make contents: [code] prt.exe: prt.o gcc prt.o -o prt.exe prt.o: prt.c portaudio.h gcc -c prt.c
clean: rm -rf *.o [/code]
and added it to the section for makefile in netbeans project but its not working. it keeps on saying: [code]make: Makefile: No such file or directory make: *** No rule to make target `Makefile'. Stop.[/code]
how the hell do you make a makefile in netbeans or visual C++, or codeblocks... i am used to doing it through terminal in redhat
really desperate

item.title: Makefile in Netbeans

item.description:
@Tu1 wrote:

i think you make them from the netbeans command line or w/e

and for VC++ you have to new->project->makefile_project

idk for sure i don’t use IDE’s too often

Read full topic

item.title: Makefile in Netbeans
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

i created a file called:Make
contents:

prt.exe: prt.o
	gcc prt.o -o prt.exe
prt.o: prt.c portaudio.h
	gcc -c prt.c

clean:
	rm -rf *.o

and added it to the section for makefile in netbeans project but its not working. it keeps on saying:

make: Makefile: No such file or directory make: *** No rule to make target `Makefile'. Stop.

how the hell do you make a makefile in netbeans or visual C++, or codeblocks…
i am used to doing it through terminal in redhat

really desperate

Read full topic
